name: oc-wh-modal
author: Thomas Leconte
description: Plugin Modal en React pour le projet Wealth Healt

scripts.build: rd /s /q dist && NODE_ENV=production babel src/lib --out-dir dist --copy-files --ignore __tests__,spec.js,test.js,__snapshots__
scripts.clean:fix: rm -rf node_modules coverage build dist docs package-lock.json
